posts.title: Jeans and Company T-Shirt - missed connections
posts.body: Recent new addition to the office, and this is your first casual Friday. Whew.  Your work attire hides what an amazing body you have. You have  perfect mix of toned, tanned, and muscularity.  Describe your shoes today. Let's grab a drink after work and see what comes up.

posts.title: Cute girl on J train Thurs afternoon - missed connections
posts.body: long shot, but here goes:i'm looking for the super cute Asian girl (w/ a couple tattoos, white Adidas sneakers and striped(?) shorts) who sat across from me on the J train Thursday afternoon around 3pm. i'm the white guy in all black with bleached hair and a dangly earring. we made eye contact a couple times. we both got off at the Marcy stop and I wanted to talk with you but you stayed behind to change trains...

posts.title: Off Milford St. - missed connections
posts.body: I met you the night of Jan 6 and had your phone number in my phone.  You told me to call you when convenient.  My phone crashed and I lost your number.  I would like to talk to you.  Either call me, or message me, or send so info to this.
